body:
Folks, I cannot run the ruby scripts, but this is probably because of my 
ignorance of Ruby.


I tried to convert the OSM model into Radiance, but I got an error that 
says:
"require": no such file to load -- openstudio (LoadError)


Is there a library that I need to put somewhere?


My installation is Windows 7 and OpenStudio 0.8.1. I have extracted 
Ruby.zip from OpenStudio website in C:\Ruby and put C:\Ruby\bin in the PATH.


Note that I would love to work in Linux, but apparently OpenStudio can 
only work with boost 1.40. The default on mine is 1.46, so OpenStudio 
would not install. It would be great if there is a how-to on downgrading 
boost just for OpenStudio.


Thanks,


Ery
___
